author: @FOX5NY
title: Long Island | FOX 5 New York
text: [Red Lobster closures: Why restaurant chains are struggling](/news/red-lobster-closures-restaurant-chain-struggles) Some Long Islanders are among those upset that the nationwide chain, Red Lobster abruptly closed dozens of its restaurants, including one in Stony Brook on Long Island. [Cricket thrives on Long Island, host of 1st T20 World Cup](/news/cricket-world-cup-long-island) A stadium boasting 34,000 seats and a precisely trimmed field of soft Kentucky bluegrass is rising in Eisenhower Park on Long Island that will host one of the world's top cricket tournaments next month -- the T20 World Cup. [Nassau County gears up for ICC Men's T20 Cricket World Cup](/news/nassau-county-gears-up-for-first-ever-mens-t20-cricket-world-cup-qualifiers) For the first time ever, the United States will host the ICC Men's T20 Cricket World Cup at a new, 34,000-seat stadium in East Meadow, Nassau County. [Contamination concerns on Long Island as decades-old chemical drums unearthed at former Grumman site](/news/chemical-drums-found-buried-at-long-island-park) Chemical drums that date back decades were found buried in the Bethpage Community Park on Long Island. [Judge strikes down Nassau County's ban on female transgender athletes after roller derby league sues](/news/judge-strikes-down-nassau-countys-ban-on-female-transgender-athletes-after-roller-derby-league-sues) A New York judge has struck down a Long Island county’s order banning female transgender athletes after a local women’s roller derby league challenged it. [Stony Brook University study uses AI to track public mental health via social media](/news/stony-brook-university-study-uses-ai-to-track-public-mental-health-via-social-media) As we hear more and more about artificial intelligence, a study out of Stony Brook University shows how AI can measure the public's mental health through social media. [2 Long Island men charged for stealing rims and tires](/news/long-island-randy-woods-dwayne-jones-charged-stealing-rims-tires) The two men who stole rims and tires from 114 vehicles on Long Island over 15 months have been charged. [Accused international jewel thief arraigned on Long Island](/news/accused-international-jewel-thief-arraigned-on-long-island) Yaorong Wan was charged with grand larceny Tuesday after allegedly stealing a watch worth more than $17,000 from a jeweler in Nassau County. Police have linked him to multiple other jewel thefts across the world. [Student from Long Island in coma after illegal dirt bike hit-and-run near NY college](/news/university-of-albany-student-in-coma-after-illegal-dirt-bike-hit-and-run) Alexa Kropf, a 19-year-old from Long Island, is in a coma after she was struck by an "illegal dirt bike" on April 27 just after midnight, police said. [Long Island teen arrested in car crash that killed 73-year-old woman](/news/long-island-centerreach-fatal-car-crash-teen-arrested) Police arrested a teenager on Long Island Saturday night, accused of driving while high and trying to flee the scene of a car crash that killed a 73-year-old woman. [ELIJA Farm grows opportunities for adults with autism on Long Island](/news/elija-farm-grows-opportunities-for-adults-with-autism-on-long-island) ELIJA Farm on Long Island is working to create an inclusive space where autistic people can learn valuable job skills while helping others. [Small airplane makes emergency landing on Long Island beach](/news/small-airplane-makes-emergency-landing-on-long-island-beach) A single-engine airplane made a landing on Cedar Beach in Mount Sinai, Long Island after the pilot reported an engine failure. [Long Island man pleads guilty to drugged driving crash that killed father, 3 kids](/news/michael-deangelo-pleads-guilty-to-charges-that-killed-family) A Long Island man pleaded guilty Wednesday to aggravated vehicular homicide charges after a drugged-driving crash killed a father and his three children last year. [LI body parts case: Victims involved in knifepoint robbery before murders, prosecutors say](/news/li-body-parts-found-case-suspects-court-charges) Steven Brown and Amanda Wallace are expected to face additional charges at a court appearance in Riverhead in connection to human body parts found scattered across parts of Babylon and Bethpage on Long Island. [Long Island body parts found: Group of suspects face numerous charges including murder](/news/long-island-body-parts-found-murder-charges-suspects-court) Steven Brown and Amanda Wallace are expected to face additional charges, including robbery and conspiracy at a court appearance in Riverhead. [Long Island disability advocates protest New York's Medicaid cuts](/news/long-island-disability-advocates-protest-new-yorks-medicaid-cuts) Governor Kathy Hochul has announced a plan to cut down on the number oif fiscal intermediaries in the the Medicaid-funded Consumer Directed Personal Assistance Program, or CDPAP. [Long Island woman accused of fleeing in police car after fatal DWI crash](/news/massapequa-car-crash-long-island-fatal-dwi) Rachel Lodice, of Jericho, was driving on Hicksville Road in Massapequa, Long Island when she struck another vehicle traveling eastbound on Sunrise Highway, the Nassau County Police Department said. [Search on Long Island connected to Gilgo Beach killings investigation: sources](/news/search-on-long-island-connected-to-gilgo-beach-killings-investigation-sources) Sources tell FOX 5 NY that a search is currently underway on Long Island in connection to the investigation into the Gilgo Beach killings. [Long Island man charged after wielding knife at neighbor's door: VIDEO](/news/long-island-knife-incident-suffolk-county) Edmond Yoon, of Farmingville, was reportedly trying to get the resident to go outside, police on Long Island said. [Boy with rare blood disorder receives new life-changing gene therapy treatment](/news/long-island-boy-thalassemia-treatment) Yusuf Saeed, an 8-year-old born with a rare genetic blood disorder called thalassemia, received a new and transformative gene therapy treatment at Cohen Children’s Medical Center on Long Island.
